DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this research study is to see how helpful two different interventions offered through the Calmer Life program are in reducing worry and improving mood. The investigators also want to understand how a program like Calmer Life can be offered in underserved communities.
DOC.brief_title: Calmer Life: Treating Worry Among Older Adults In Underserved, Low-income, Minority Communities
DOC.criteria: PSWQ greater than 22 PHQ score less than 20 Active suicidal intent Active psychosis or bipolar disorder Substance abuse Cognitive impairment
